original_title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 5: Verdi: Aida
overview: The historic Toscanini television concerts with the NBC Symphony Orchestra. This concert, broadcast in two parts, on 26 March and 2 April 1949, from NBC Studio 8H, features the opera "Aida" by Giuseppe Verdi. (Both broadcasts were released as "Vol. 3" in the DVD series.)
title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 5: Verdi: Aida
